word: Holiness of heart will never lead to impure actions. . . . The truth of heavenly origin never degrades the receiver . . .; on the contrary, it sanctifies the believer, refines his taste, elevates and ennobles him, and brings him into a close connection with Jesus. It leads him to regard the apostle Paul's injunction to abstain from even the appearance of evil, lest his "good should be evil spoken of."
